text: Woo Ji-won Woo Ji-won (; born 2 April 1973) is a South Korean male professional basketball player. In 2010, the Korean Basketball League retired his number 10 shirt. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean men's basketball players Category:South Korean sports commentators Category:Basketball announcers Category:Incheon Electroland Elephants players Category:Ulsan Hyundai Mobis Phoebus players Category:Seoul Samsung Thunders players Category:Korean Basketball League players with retired numbers Category:Kyungbock High School alumni Category:Yonsei University alumni Category:King of Mask Singer contestants
title: Woo Ji-won
